chapter.title: How to use this document
chapter.para: If you've just found out about Boost.Build V2 and want to know if it will work for you, start with . You can continue with the . When you're ready to try Boost.Build in practice, go to .
If you are about to use Boost.Build on your project, or already using it and have a problem, look at .
If you're trying to build a project which uses Boost.Build, look at and then read about .
Finally, if nothing applies to you, write to our mailing list, telling what information you'd like to know.
